00017 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrProjParam.h"
00020 
00036 MTKt_status MtkPathBlockRangeToBlockCorners(
00037   int path,                         
00038   int start_block,                  
00039   int end_block,                    
00040   MTKt_BlockCorners *block_corners   )
00041 {
00042   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00043   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00044   int i;            /* Block index */
00045   MTKt_BlockCorners blkcrnrs = MTKT_BLOCKCORNERS_INIT;
00046                 /* Block corners */
00047 
00048   if (block_corners == NULL)
00049     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00050 
00051   /* Check path bounds */
00052   if (path < 1 || path > 233)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00054 
00055   /* Check block bounds */
00056   if (start_block > end_block)
00057     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00058 
00059   if (start_block < 1 || end_block > 180)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00061 
00062   blkcrnrs.path = path;
00063   blkcrnrs.start_block = start_block;
00064   blkcrnrs.end_block = end_block;
00065 
00066   for (i = start_block; i <= end_block; i++) {
00067     blkcrnrs.block[i].block_number = i;
00068 
00069     status = MtkBlsToLatLon(path, MAXRESOLUTION, i,
00070                 0.0, 0.0,
00071                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].ulc.lat),
00072                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].ulc.lon));
00073     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00074 
00075     status = MtkBlsToLatLon(path, MAXRESOLUTION, i,
00076                 0.0, MAXNSAMPLE-1,
00077                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].urc.lat),
00078                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].urc.lon));
00079     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00080 
00081     status = MtkBlsToLatLon(path, MAXRESOLUTION, i,
00082                 (MAXNLINE-1) / 2.0, (MAXNSAMPLE-1) / 2.0,
00083                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].ctr.lat),
00084                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].ctr.lon));
00085     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00086 
00087     status = MtkBlsToLatLon(path, MAXRESOLUTION, i,
00088                 MAXNLINE-1, MAXNSAMPLE-1,
00089                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].lrc.lat),
00090                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].lrc.lon));
00091     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00092 
00093     status = MtkBlsToLatLon(path, MAXRESOLUTION, i,
00094                 MAXNLINE-1, 0.0,
00095                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].llc.lat),
00096                 &(blkcrnrs.block[i].llc.lon));
00097     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00098   }
00099 
00100   *block_corners = blkcrnrs;
00101 
00102   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00103 
00104 ERROR_HANDLE:
00105   return status_code;
00106 }
